mapper.select: SELECT s.*, b.comp_name FROM shop_product s JOIN business b ON s.business_email = b.business_email WHERE s.shop_category = #{shopCategory}

SELECT s.* , b.comp_name FROM shop_product s JOIN business b ON s.business_email = b.business_email WHERE s.shop_product_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR s.shop_category LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR s.business_email IN (SELECT business_email FROM business WHERE comp_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND member_type=2)
SELECT s.*, b.comp_name FROM shop_product s JOIN business b ON s.business_email = b.business_email WHERE s.shop_product_no = #{shopProductNo}
SELECT shop_product_img FROM shop_product_img WHERE shop_product_no = #{shopProductNo}
